greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Compound filter (2-adic valuation of phi(n) & sigma(n)): a(n) = P(A053574(n), A000203(n)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: def T(n, m): return ((n + m)**2 - n - 3*m + 2)/2
def a(n): return T(a007814(totient(n)), divisor_sigma(n)) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 26 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 26 2017
